grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 泊【ハク】counter for nights of a stay
漂泊【ヒョウハク】roaming, drifting about, wandering
無断外泊【ムダンガイハク】staying out overnight without giving notice, spending night(s) away from home without permission (leave)
kun reading compounds: 泊まる【とまる】to stay at (e.g. hotel), to be docked, to be berthed, to be moored
泊める【とめる】to give shelter to, to lodge, to put up, to accommodate
